page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content:
The area we cover is a rural one and most of the people do{gardening}in their spare time.All of the gardens are well kept and always look neat and tidy. {Fishing}is another hobby because the people are near the river and they have no problem in getting transport because they can walk to the river bank. Some people go{horse riding}if they have got a horse or they can hire one.
People may choose to go{rambling}in the fields or{shooting}pheasant or pigeons. Others leave Rodley and go to other places outside the area to keep fit classes, dancing or photography.
